line.text: %SPIDERMANsimple%: If I knew then, what I know now, would I have gone to that exhibit? Would I have let that radioactive spider bite me? That's a very tough question.
%SPIDERMANsimple%: Sure, because of that bite, I now have super strength, can climb walls and have a sixth sense for danger. But fighting crime really puts a crimp in my social life.

%SPIDERMANsimple%: And then there's the army of lunatics out there who'd love to play hockey with my skull. So being Spider-Man isn't all money and glamour... well, there is no money or glamour. But I do get to kick the stuffing out of guys like The Scorpion...
